text: Hianagi keagama refko hu kva vahe'ma nefrizage'za Israeli vahe'mo'za ete rukrahe hu'za korapa zamavu'zamava zamifi vu'za zamafahe'mo'za hu'naza havi zamavu'zamavara zamagatere'za tusi kefo zamavu'zamava hu'za zamare'na re'za monora hunezamante'za eri'zana eri'zamante'naze. Magore hu'za kefo zamavu'zamavara otre'naze.
